secret_rule: Only items that are typically found in a kitchen can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "spatula" and "cutting board".
Can I bring a frying pan?
Player: Can I bring a knife?
Player: Can I bring a whisk?
Player: Can I bring a rolling pin?
Player: Can I bring a grater?
Player: Can I bring a peeler?
Player: Can I bring a wooden spoon?
Player: Can I bring a meat tenderizer?
Player: Can I bring a mixing bowl?
The rule is that you can only bring kitchen utensils or tools.
